page.title: 11N.St Ives schoolday.
page.content: On a typical school day I get up at quarter to eight.I have a wash and get dressed ,then I have my breakfast. After that I clean my teeth and set off for school. The school that I go to is called Thorndown Junior .It takes eleven minutes for me to get to school. In the school play ground I meet my best friend Tracy Mckie .The first thing we have is register. It then depends on what day it is but it usually is maths from 9.15 until 10.10.Then we go in to the hall for assembly .We then go out on to the play ground for 15 minutes. We then do language. It is then lunch time.Then we go out on to the play ground for one hour.After that we read silently for quarter of an hour.At the end of the day Mr Summerell reads us a story and I walk home.
